channel.title: untagged on My corner
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on My corner

item.title: The History of Testing In Software Systems
item.description: My name is Arturo Ramos Viedas, and I wrote this blog post as part of an assignment for my TC2007B course. It’s hard to talk about the history of software, and about software and programming in general, without at least touching on the subject of testing. In fact, it’s hard for me to think about coding even a very simple program without including some sort of test in the process. This has been the case for a long time, probably for as long as I’ve been writing code.
